hero.title: BAGNI LINA
hero.subtitle: YOUR CORNER OF PARADISE IN CELLE LIGURE (SV)

about.title: AN OASIS OF COMFORT AND TAILORED SERVICES
about.subtitle: AT BAGNI LINA EVERY DETAIL IS DESIGNED FOR YOUR WELL-BEING
about.description: Located in the splendid setting of Ponente beach in Celle Ligure, one of the most beautiful villages in Italy, Bagni Lina has been a beloved reference point for decades for families, couples and all those who wish to experience the wonders of the Ligurian sea. Here, relaxation and fun merge into an unforgettable experience, where every visitor, young and old, will feel at home.

bar.title: BAR AND RESTAURANT
bar.description: Our welcoming bar awaits you to refresh you with drinks and treats. If you're hungry, you can enjoy cold dishes, perfect for a light and tasty lunch with a sea view.

dehors.title: SPACIOUS PANORAMIC TERRACE
dehors.description: Relax and enjoy the unique atmosphere of our spacious terrace. With both wooden and tiled flooring, it offers the ideal environment for a break in total serenity.

lockers.title: CHANGING ROOMS
lockers.description: With our umbrella and equipment (deck chair, chair or sun bed of your choice), you'll have access to the changing room to change comfortably, without the need to rent a cabin.

facilities.title: FACILITIES
facilities.description: You'll find a practical foot wash, a large washbasin, separate showers (hot in cabin for â‚¬1 and cold), and separate bathrooms for men and women, always clean and sanitized.

accessibility.title: ACCESSIBILITY
accessibility.description: We are proud to offer an inclusive experience; Bagni Lina is equipped with bathrooms and changing rooms dedicated to customers with disabilities, so that the pleasure of the sea is truly accessible to everyone.

management.title: NEW MANAGEMENT
management.description: The new management awaits you with a smile! We are excited to welcome you under the new management of Massimo and Luca (our expert lifeguard). Their passion and professionalism will guarantee you a warm welcome and impeccable service.
management.cta: WE AWAIT YOU AT BAGNI LINA FOR AN UNFORGETTABLE SEASON!
management.invitation: COME VISIT US, YOU WON'T BE DISAPPOINTED!
